statement.name: INSERT_SMADST
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMADST (NRODST, AGNPRS, PRDPRS, TPOPRS, NROPRS, CODDST, FCHDST, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMADST
statement.sql: Update SMADST Set AGNPRS=?, PRDPRS=?, TPOPRS=?, NROPRS=?, CODDST=?, FCHDST=?, SQLBKR=? Where NRODST=?
